title: Blaze Of Glory: The Last Ride of the Western Heroes
description: In 1885, the people of Wonderment, Montana, are being terrorized by Nightriders who want them off the land. One resident, Reno Jones, is a former gunslinger. When he calls in a few favors, the town is soon teeming with famous outlaws and lawmen who have answered the call for help.
author: John Ostrander
